desc:
When an applet is first created, an applet stub is attached to it
using the applet's setStub method. This stub
serves as the interface between the applet and the browser
environment or applet viewer environment in which the application
is running.

entries.desc: Called when the applet wants to be resized.
entries.name:
appletResize(int width,
int height)

entries.desc: Gets the URL of the document in which the applet is embedded.
entries.name: getDocumentBase()

entries.desc: Returns the value of the named parameter in the HTML tag.
entries.name: getParameter(String name)

entries.desc: Determines if the applet is active.
entries.name: isActive()
